component.name: tqsl
component.developer_name: ARRL, the national association for Amateur Radio

description.p: Mission The mission of the Trusted QSL Group is to keep eQSL an open and free activity for amateur radio operators by promoting the Digital Signature Standard (DSS). Goal The goal of the Trusted QSL Group is to set the standards and create the necessary tools and software needed to implement the Trusted DSS model. I would like to point out to you know who, if you don’t resupply the washrooms with environmentally friend paper goods and other janitorial supplies within 24 hours you are going to have some irate employees breathing down your neck. Don’t say you don’t have any time to order janitorial supplies because we all know you just go online and place an order at CleanItSupply. Make sure you order the paper products that are free of fragrances, inks, and dyes, as well as meet the Green Seal environmental standard for bleaching, and de-inking. And likewise make sure the cleaning products for the floors, sinks, mirrors, etc are free from harsh chemical fumes or chemical residue. Some of us are highly allergic. CleanItSupply has all those green janitorial supplies, so get with the program! Sorry about that rant, but sometimes you need some public humiliation to get the job done right!
